fcb_fab_flexible_title: One-Stop Ceramic PCB Manufacturer: AlN PCB and Alumina PCB for Power Devices
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: Ceramic PCBs are normally aluminum nitride or alumina substrate circuit boards and feature excellent thermal conductivity, heat resistance, and electrical insulation. PCBONLINE manufactures and assembles alumina PCBs, aluminum nitride PCBs, silicon nitride PCBs, IGBT ceramic substrate boards, 3D alumina products used for LEDs, laser equipment, semiconductor, automotive electronics, microwave communications, industrial transducers, etc.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_two: Except for BeO PCBs, PCBONLINE provides all types of ceramic PCBs, such as multilayer PCB (HDI), Rogers/FR-4/CEM-3/SST/PTFE/aluminum/copper ceramic hybrid circuit boards. Our target customers for these types of products are senior engineers, solutions companies, research institutes/organizations, business makers. We can help you in your ceramic PCB project by providing free technical support, from choosing ceramic PCB materials, reasonable layout to the end product assembly and testings.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Ceramic PCBs have stable shape warping and low expansion coefficient.
• Ceramic PCBs have a large current carrying capacity and good insulation performance.
• Ceramic PCBs have higher thermal conductivity and resistance.
• Ceramic PCBs have stable high-frequency performance and lower DK values.
• Ceramic PCBs have good insulation and can achieve a better conductivity and insulation effect.
• Ceramic PCBs have strong chemical stability and no water absorption.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: Lead-Free PCB does no harm to the human-being and the environment, and can be shipped to Europe and rest the world. You can online order lead-free PCB, soldering, and components from us.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: Aluminum PCB is an excellent choice for applications that require high power yields within tight tolerances, such as automotive and power electronics, thermal sensitive equipment or anything else that heat can damage it's components.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: High-TG PCB is featured with its incomparable ability to withstand the high heat. With it, the performance of an electronic device is guaranteed as the board always supports and connects all components firmly.
